text:
(a)     The Board of Supervisors shall adopt by ordinance those regulations and rules for the Program that the Board of Supervisors determines appropriate. Those regulations shall address matters including, but not limited to, Program and fund administration, nondiscrimination, qualification for loans, loan documentation and enforcement. 
(Added by Ord. 1-93, App. 1/7/93; amended by Ord. 1-01, File No. 001968, App. 1/12/2001)
